original_text: and also bring half a hin of wine as a drink offering. This will be a food offering, an aroma pleasing to the Lord.
korean_text: 전제로 포도주 반 힌을 드려 여호와 앞에 향기로운 화제를 삼을지니라

sentences.original_text: and also bring half a hin of wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또 반 힌의 포도주를 가져오고

sentences.original_text: This will be a food offering
an aroma pleasing to the Lord
